scripts.super-clean: cd firebase && npm run clean && cd .. && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf */node_modules && rm -rf */*/node_modules && npm run clean -ws --if-present
scripts.dev:prep: npm run clean:logs && cd firebase && npm run clean && cd .. && npm run build
scripts.dev: npm run dev:prep && concurrently "cd webapp && npm run watch" "cd firebase && npm run link-webapp && npm run start-emulators"
scripts.build:all: npm run build -w webapp && npm run build -w webapp-v2
scripts.test:unit: cd firebase/functions && npm run test:unit && cd ../../webapp && npm run test:unit
scripts.test:integration: cd firebase/functions && npm run test:integration && cd ../../webapp && npm run test:integration
scripts.dev:integrated: npm run clean:logs && npm run build:all && cd firebase && npm run link-webapp && npm run start-emulators
